item.title: Buy Samsung Galaxy S23 256GB for under Rs 25,000: Massive discounts on Amazon - India TV News
item.description:
Buy Samsung Galaxy S23 256GB for under Rs 25,000: Massive discounts on Amazon

Publication Date: January 2025 - Source: India TV News

The Republic Day Sales are currently live, offering significant discounts on the Samsung Galaxy S23 5G 256GB, originally priced at nearly Rs 1 lakh, now available for Rs 48,988 on Amazon, a 49% discount.

  • Bank Offers: Instant Rs 1,000 discount for SBI Bank cardholders and no-cost EMIs starting at Rs 2,205 per month.
  • Exchange Offer: Trade in your old phone for a potential additional Rs 22,800 off.
  • Powerful Performance: Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor for smooth multitasking and gaming.
  • Exceptional Camera Setup: Triple-camera system with 50MP wide sensor, including features for selfies and video calls.
“You can potentially snag the Galaxy S23 for less than Rs 25,000.”

The sale provides a great opportunity for consumers to purchase a flagship device at a considerably lower price, with various financing options and an appealing trade-in program.

item.title: Desi CEO of AI giant is all praise for this Google phone, says is 'Apple iPhone quality' - The Times of India
item.description:
Desi CEO of AI giant is all praise for this Google phone, says is 'Apple iPhone quality'

Publication Date: Unknown
Source: Times of India

The article discusses the positive remarks made by the CEO of an AI company about a recent Google phone, comparing its quality to that of an iPhone.

  • The CEO highlights the premium build quality and features of the Google phone.
  • He emphasizes its potential impact in the market.
  • The discussion showcases advancements in smartphone technology.
"This phone is on par with Apple iPhone quality," said the CEO.

The article indicates a shifting landscape in the smartphone industry, where competition is enhancing product quality.

item.title: iPhone SE 4 to launch in April 2025: Apple’s budget device with big upgrades - India TV News
item.description:
iPhone SE 4 to launch in April 2025: Apple’s budget device with big upgrades

Publication Date: January 18, 2025

Source: India TV News

Apple is set to bring back the iPhone SE lineup after a two-year hiatus with the fourth-generation model expected to launch in April 2025, possibly rebranded as the iPhone 16e.

Key Points:

  • The iPhone SE 4 is rumored to undergo a complete design overhaul with significant upgrades.
  • Leaked images suggest a design similar to the iPhone 14.
  • Expected upgrades include a larger 6.6-inch OLED display, A18 chipset, 8GB of RAM, and a 48MP rear camera.
  • Potential rebranding as the iPhone 16e aligns it with recent high-end models.
“This move could represent a significant leap for Apple’s entry-level iPhone, positioning it as a competitive option for budget-conscious buyers.”

The iPhone SE 4 aims to cater to budget-conscious consumers while offering features that align it closely with Apple's premium devices, further enhancing its appeal in the competitive smartphone market.

item.title: Garena Free Fire MAX Redeem Codes for January 18: Special reward codes - India TV News
item.description:
Garena Free Fire MAX Redeem Codes for January 18: Special Reward Codes

Date & Source: January 18, 2025 - India TV News

Garena Free Fire MAX has released daily redemption codes that players can use to claim various in-game freebies. These codes enhance the gaming experience with items like weapon skins and diamonds.

Redeem codes for January 18

Latest Free Fire MAX redeem codes valid for today:

  1. FFNRX2MQ7SUA – Naruto Evo Bundle + Rasengan Emote
  2. FCSP9XQ2TNZK – Super Emote – Gamabunta Summoning
  3. FFKSY7PQNWHG – Kakashi Bundle
  4. FFMGY7TPWNV2 – Naruto Emote – Ninja Run, Ninja Sign, Clone Jutsu, Thousand Years Of Death
  5. FFNFSXTPVQZ9 – Ninjutsu Theme Naruto Fist Skin
  6. FWSKTXVQF2NR – Sasuke Ring (Without Katana) + Katana Snake Sword
  7. FFSUTXVQF2NR – Sasuke (Without Katana) Special Gold Royale Bundle + Rasengan Emote
  8. FFNRWTQPFDZ9 – Naruto Ascension + Rasengan + Gloo Wall – Hokage Rock + Loot Box – Body Substitution
  9. FFMSTXP2FWCK – Mystery Shop – Sakura Bundle, Grand Slam Bundle
  10. BLFY7MSTFXV2 – Rose Emote
  11. FY9MFW7KFSNN – Cobra Bundle
  12. FFXT7SW9KG2M – 1875 Diamonds
  13. NPCQ2FW7PXN2 – M1887 One Punch Man Skin
  14. FF4MTXQPFDZ9 – Poker MP40 Ring

Free Fire MAX Active Redeem Codes List

  1. FW4XJ7WQZ42A
  2. FD3TZK7WME65
  3. D6YC4TN6VKQ9
  4. DJ3AT3ZREM45
  5. HZ2RM8VW9TP7
  6. UPQ7X5NMJ64V
  7. KFN9Y6XW4Z89
  8. MN3XK4TY9EP1
  9. ZRW3J4N8VX56
  10. V44ZX8Y7GJ52
  11. XN7TP5RM3K49
  12. TFX9J3Z2RP64

Players must be aware that these codes are region-specific and time-sensitive, encouraging quick redemption before expiration.

How to Redeem Free Fire MAX codes

  • Visit the official Free Fire MAX rewards redemption website: reward.ff.garena.com.
  • Log in using your Free Fire MAX account credentials.
  • Click on the redeem banner after logging in.
  • Enter the redeem code and click Confirm.

Rewards will be credited to accounts within 24 hours if successful.

Free Fire MAX: Important Information

  1. Available in India while the original Free Fire is banned.
  2. Codes are region-specific; incorrect codes may lead to errors.
  3. Urgency is advised due to time-sensitive nature of codes.

item.title: Nintendo shares the first official look of the Switch 2, more details coming on April 2: Expected... - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Nintendo Reveals First Look at Switch 2 with Details Coming in April

January 18, 2025 / Moneycontrol

After months of teases and rumors, Nintendo has finally revealed the successor to Switch, which comes eight years after the launch of its predecessor. The company hasn’t given a release date for the Switch 2 but said it would reveal more details in April.

  • Nintendo has unveiled the new Switch 2 with a teaser video.
  • The Switch 2 is expected to launch in 2025 with a possible announcement on April 2.
  • Pricing estimates suggest a starting price of $400 to $450.
“The handheld console showcases improvements without disclosing specs or availability.”

This announcement marks a significant moment for Nintendo as it transitions to new hardware, keeping fans excited for more information.

item.title: Samsung and OpenAI working together to bring ChatGPT to smart TVs: Report - The Indian Express
item.description:
Samsung and OpenAI Working Together to Bring ChatGPT to Smart TVs: Report

Publication Date: January 18, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

Samsung is collaborating with OpenAI to potentially integrate ChatGPT into its smart TV lineup, enhancing AI features for personalized content recommendations and user interactions.

  • Strategic partnership aims to maintain Samsung's leading position in the TV market.
  • Possibility of real-time translation of audio and subtitles.
  • Users might request personalized healthcare advice and control TV settings through ChatGPT.
  • Existing AI features on TizenOS include AI upscaling, AI Sound, and AI Vision.
  • Competition includes Google's integration of its AI chatbot, Gemini, into Google TV OS.
  • Details are still being finalized, and information may change.
"Take this information with a grain of salt since things may change down the line."

In conclusion, the collaboration could significantly upgrade user experience on Samsung smart TVs, keeping it competitive in a rapidly evolving market.

item.title: OpenAI finalises ‘o3 mini’ reasoning AI model version, to launch it soon - The Hindu
item.description:
OpenAI finalises ‘o3 mini’ reasoning AI model version, to launch it soon

Date: January 18, 2025

Source: The Hindu

OpenAI's CEO Sam Altman announced the finalization of the 'o3 mini', a new reasoning AI model, set to launch in the upcoming weeks.

  • The 'o3 mini' is part of OpenAI's effort to enhance its AI models to tackle complex problems.
  • The API and ChatGPT will be released simultaneously, focusing on user feedback.
  • The o3 models aim to advance competition with Google in the AI domain.
  • The release is anticipated by the end of January, with a stronger 'o3' version following soon.
  • OpenAI's previous models, the o1 series, focus on handling more complex queries effectively.
“The new o3 and o3 mini models would be more powerful than the previously launched o1 models.”

This launch reflects OpenAI's commitment to innovation and maintaining a competitive edge in the rapidly evolving AI landscape.

item.title: Apple pulls error-prone AI-generated news feature in beta iPhone software - Business Standard
item.description:
Apple Suspends AI News Feature Due to Inaccuracies

Date: Jan 18 2025 | Source: Business Standard

Apple is suspending an error-prone feature that used artificial intelligence to deliver bogus news alerts to iPhone owners following complaints from several media organizations.

  • AI-generated news alerts were causing misinformation and erroneous headlines.
  • The feature is disabled while Apple works on fixing the underlying issues described as hallucinations.
  • This suspension impacts upcoming software versions, including iOS 18.3 for iPhones and updates for iPads and Macs.
  • High-profile mistakes have attracted attention, such as false alerts from BBC News.
  • Apple's AI initiative began with the iPhone 16, aiming to incorporate more AI in their products.
The BBC was among the media organisations that complained about the balky news summary feature after Apple sent alerts that transformed its reports into false headlines.

The temporary suspension highlights challenges Apple faces in its push into artificial intelligence and the importance of accuracy in new technology.

item.description:
Tech wrap: realme 14 Pro, TCL QD Mini LED TV, HONOR Magic7 Pro and more

Publication Date: March 2024 | Source: CNBC TV18

This week in technology brings exciting launches including the realme 14 Pro series, TCL's QD Mini LED TV, and HONOR's Magic7 Pro.

  • Realme 14 Pro series: Includes the realme 14 Pro+ and realme 14 Pro, featuring Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 chipset.
  • TCL QD Mini LED TV: A 115-inch model costing Rs 29,99,900, offers pre-booking incentives.
  • HONOR Magic7 Pro: Flagship smartphone with Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and OLED display.
  • Samsung Galaxy S25 Series: Upcoming launch leaks ahead of Galaxy Unpacked event.
  • JVC QLED TV: New range of Made in India smart TVs available in multiple sizes.
  • Samsung Galaxy Ring: New sizes added for the health tracking wearable, available at Galaxy Unpacked event.
“The technology industry saw a series of new product debuts and updates this week.”

The latest releases showcase significant advancements in technology, catering to various consumer needs and preferences.

item.title: Anand Group eyes growth as EV transition drives auto component demand | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Anand Group Eyes Growth as EV Transition Drives Auto Component Demand

Publication Date: Not specified   Source: Mint

The Indian auto components maker Anand Group is gearing up for significant growth this year due to the automotive industry's accelerated shift towards electrification, despite facing some global market challenges.

  • Anand Group is focusing on electric vehicle (EV) components, highlighting increased value in thermal systems and braking solutions.
  • Group CEO Mahendra Goyal noted a six-to-seven-fold rise in per-vehicle content value for EVs compared to traditional vehicles.
  • The company has introduced new products like e-compressors and integrated thermal systems tailored for EVs.
“The value proposition for EVs is dramatically higher compared to internal combustion engines.” - Mahendra Goyal

The Anand Group demonstrates its readiness to capitalize on the growing EV market, aiming to adapt swiftly to the developments within the automotive sector.

item.title: How to stay in the loop with Samsung's new Galaxy S25 series launch event - Pocket-lint
item.description:
How to watch the Samsung Galaxy S25 Unpacked event from the comfort of your own living room

Publication Date: January 22, 2025

Source: Pocket-lint

Samsung's major Galaxy S25 series keynote is just around the corner, where the company will unveil the latest generation of its flagship smartphone line and new accessories. Here's how to watch the event unfold in real time.

  • Samsung's Galaxy S25 Unpacked event will be streamed online on January 22, at 1:00PM EST / 10:00AM PST.
  • You can access the live stream on the official Samsung website and its YouTube channel.
  • Expect an overview of the new Galaxy S25 series, which is rumored to include Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite and camera upgrades.
"The majority of the year-over-year upgrades can be described as spec bumps."

Stay tuned for this important launch event as Samsung aims to maintain its dominance in the smartphone market amidst stiff competition.

item.title: Genshin Impact Game Developer Will be Banned from Selling Lootboxes to Teens Under 16 without Parental Consent, Pay a $20 Million Fine to Settle FTC Charges - Federal Trade Commission News
item.description:
Genshin Impact Developer Faces $20 Million Fine for Misleading Marketing to Minors

Publication Date: October 2023   Source: FTC Announcement

The developer of Genshin Impact has agreed to pay a $20 million settlement after allegations of violating children's privacy laws and misleading marketing towards minors.

  • The agreement includes banning sales of loot boxes to children under 16 without parental consent.
  • FTC stated that Genshin Impact's tactics misled children about the costs and chances of winning in-game prizes.
  • The company collected personal information from children without necessary parental consent.
  • Proposed changes require clear disclosure of loot box odds and the removal of personal information collected from children under 13.
“Genshin Impact deceived children, teens, and other players into spending hundreds of dollars on prizes they stood little chance of winning.” - Samuel Levine, FTC

This enforcement action serves as a warning to companies about the accountability for marketing practices to children.

item.title: Review: The OnePlus 13R is a Pixel 9 for everyone else - 9to5Google
item.description:
Review: The OnePlus 13R is a Pixel 9 for everyone else

Publication Date: January 2025

Source: 9to5Google

The OnePlus 13R takes a strong stance in the budget smartphone market, deriving its appeal from a combination of flagship features at a more accessible price point, making it an attractive alternative to the Pixel 9.

  • The OnePlus 13R is priced at $599, offering substantial value compared to competitors.
  • It features a robust build and pleasing design, particularly in its “Astral Trail” color.
  • The 6.78-inch OLED display provides vibrant colors and impressive brightness, though it lacks an ultrasonic fingerprint sensor.
  • OxygenOS 15 delivers a smooth user experience based on Android 15, with a commitment to four major OS updates.
  • Equipped with a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 and 12GB of RAM, performance is strong, making it suitable for gaming and multitasking.
  • Battery life is exceptional, with fast charging capabilities even though it lacks wireless charging.
  • The camera system includes a primary Sony LYT-700 sensor and additional ultrawide and telephoto lenses, producing high-quality images.
  • Overall, the OnePlus 13R offers many premium features at a competitive price.
“If the Pixel is for ‘everyone,’ the OnePlus 13R is for ‘everyone else.’”

In conclusion, the OnePlus 13R provides excellent value for those prioritizing battery life and performance, making it a compelling choice in the budget smartphone segment.
